Happened when I closed a PDE manifest editor and another one got activated.

Hi Daniel,

I'm having trouble reproducing the bug.
If you can describe the setup of a simple scenario that will 
produce the Exception, that would help a lot.

In any event, we probably should be checking if the widget is
disposed before adding / removing listeners to be safe.  
Thanks to Janek for pointing this out.

See attached Patch #1
Sorry Mike, no more info than in comment 1 but I wasn't able to reproduce either here.
